Lord's Edge.name: Lord's Edge
Lord's Edge.shortdescription: Killing an enemy gives wearer +15 Attack Damage.
Lord's Edge.description: Whenever the wearer kills or participates in killing an enemy, gain +15 Attack Damage for the remainder of combat. This effect can stack any number of times.

Hextech Gunblade.name: Hextech Gunblade
Hextech Gunblade.description: Basic Attacks and spells heal the wearer for 25% of the damage dealt.

Infinity Edge.name: Infinity Edge
Infinity Edge.description: The wearer gains +150% Critical Strike Damage.

Giant Slayer.name: Giant Slayer
Giant Slayer.shortdescription: Basic attacks deal 5% of target's max health.
Giant Slayer.description: The wearer's basic attacks deal an additional 5% of the target's Maximum Health as true damage.

Zeke's Herald.name: Zeke's Herald
Zeke's Herald.shortdescription: Allies within same row and 2 hexes gain 15% attack speed.
Zeke's Herald.description: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain +15% Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

Guardian Angel.name: Guardian Angel
Guardian Angel.description: When the wearer dies, they cleanse negative effects and revive with up to 500 Health after a 2 second delay. This effect can trigger once per combat.

The Bloodthirster.name: The Bloodthirster
The Bloodthirster.description: Basic Attacks heal the wearer for 40% of the damage dealt.

Spear of Shojin.name: Spear of Shojin
Spear of Shojin.shortdescription: Basic attacks restore 15% Maximum Mana after first spell-cast
Spear of Shojin.description: After casting their spell, the wearer's Basic Attacks restore 15% of their Maximum Mana.

Youmuu's Ghostblade.name: Youmuu's Ghostblade
Youmuu's Ghostblade.description: Wearer is also an Assassin (including the Innate stealthed jump).

Rabadon's Deathcap.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
Rabadon's Deathcap.description: Wearer gains +50% Spell Power Amplification. (All sources of Spell Power are 50% more effective).

Guinsoo's Rageblade.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
Guinsoo's Rageblade.description: Basic attacks grant 5% bonus attack speed for the rest of combat. Stacks with no upper limit.

Morellonomicon.name: Morellonomicon
Morellonomicon.shortdescription: Spells burn for 20% of target's max health and prevents 80% healing.
Morellonomicon.description: When the wearer deals damage with their spell, they burn the target, dealing 20% of the target's Maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds and reducing healing by 80% for the duration of the burn. A champion can only have one burn effect at a time, preferring the strongest.

Locket of the Iron Solari.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
Locket of the Iron Solari.shortdescription: Allies within same row and 2 hexes gains 300 shield.
Locket of the Iron Solari.description: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain a shield that blocks 300 damage for 7 seconds.

Ionic Spark.name: Ionic Spark
Ionic Spark.shortdescription: When an enemy casts their ability, they take 125 true damage.
Ionic Spark.description: Whenever an enemy casts their Special Ability, they take 125 true damage.

Luden's Echo.name: Luden's Echo
Luden's Echo.shortdescription: Damaging spells splash up to 3 enemies for 180 magic damage.
Luden's Echo.description: When the wearer deals damage with their Special Ability, the first target hit and up to 3 nearby enemies are dealt an additional 180 magic damage.

Yuumi.name: Yuumi
Yuumi.description: Wearer is also a Sorcerer (including the Innate bonus of mana generation).

Thief's Gloves.name: Thief's Gloves
Thief's Gloves.shortdescription: Wearer gains temporary items based on player level.
Thief's Gloves.description: At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer equips 2 temporary items. Temporary items increase in power based on your player level

Repeating Crossbow.name: Repeating Crossbow
Repeating Crossbow.shortdescription: When wearer dies, ally gains item with +20% attack speed and crit chance.
Repeating Crossbow.description: When the wearer dies, Repeating Crossbow is re-equipped to a new ally. Each time Repeating Crossbow is re-equipped, it grants additional +20% Attack Speed and +20% Critical Strike Chance for the remainder of combat. This effect can stack any number of times.

Trap Claw.name: Trap Claw
Trap Claw.shortdescription: Gain one-time shield that blocks first spell and stuns spellcaster.
Trap Claw.description: At the beginning of combat, the wearer gains a shield that blocks the first enemy spell that hits them. The enemy that breaks the shield is stunned for 5 seconds.

Iceborne Gauntlet.name: Iceborne Gauntlet
Iceborne Gauntlet.shortdescription: Dodging create a zone that slows enemies' attack speed by 35%.
Iceborne Gauntlet.description: When the wearer dodges, they create a zone of ice. Enemies inside the zone have their Attack Speed reduced by 35%.

Quicksilver.name: Quicksilver
Quicksilver.shortdescription: Wearer gets shield that prevents cc. Refreshes after 5 sec.
Quicksilver.description: The wearer gains a shield that prevents the next crowd control effect from applying. This shield refreshes after 5 seconds.

Hand of Justice.name: Hand of Justice
Hand of Justice.shortdescription: Wearer gets +40% all damage or heal 40 Health on-hit.
Hand of Justice.description: At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer gains one of the following: Basic Attacks and spells deal +40% Damage or Basic Attacks heal 40 Health on-hit.

Titanic Hydra.name: Titanic Hydra
Titanic Hydra.shortdescription: Basic attacks deal 3% of wearer's max health in cone behind target.
Titanic Hydra.description: Basic Attacks deal an additional 3% of the wearer's Maximum Health as magic damage to the target and adjacent enemies behind them.

Cursed Blade.name: Cursed Blade
Cursed Blade.shortdescription: 20% chance on-hit to decrease target's level.
Cursed Blade.description: Basic Attacks have a 20% chance on-hit to decrease the target' star level by 1 for the rest of combat.

Statikk Shiv.name: Statikk Shiv
Statikk Shiv.shortdescription: Every third basic attack deals 100 damage to 3 enemies.
Statikk Shiv.description: Every third Basic Attack from the wearer deals 100 magical damage to 3 enemies.

Warmog's Armor.name: Warmog's Armor
Warmog's Armor.shortdescription: Wearer heals 6% of their missing Health per sec.
Warmog's Armor.description: Wearer regenerates 6% of their missing Health per second.

Red Buff.name: Red Buff
Red Buff.shortdescription: Basic attacks burn for 20% of target's max health and prevents 80% healing.
Red Buff.description: Wearer's Basic Attacks burn the target on-hit, dealing 20% of the target's Maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds and reducing healing by 80% for the duration of the burn. A champion can only have one burn effect at a time, preferring the strongest.

Zephyr.name: Zephyr
Zephyr.description: When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 6 seconds.

Redemption.name: Redemption
Redemption.shortdescription: When below 25% Health, heal nearby allies for 1200 Health.
Redemption.description: When the wearer falls below 25% Health, nearby allies are healed for 1200 Health after a 2.5 second delay. This effect can trigger once per combat.

Thornmail.name: Thornmail
Thornmail.shortdescription: Reflects 100% of mitigated damage as magic damage.
Thornmail.description: When the wearer is hit by a Basic Attack, they reflect 100% of the mitigated damage as magic damage.

Sword Breaker.name: Sword Breaker
Sword Breaker.shortdescription: Basic attacks have 33% chance to prevent target from Basic Attacking.
Sword Breaker.description: Wearer's Basic Attacks have a 33% chance to disarm the target for 3 seconds, preventing that enemy from Basic Attacking.

Frozen Heart.name: Frozen Heart
Frozen Heart.shortdescription: Reduce the Attack Speed of adjacent enemies by 35%.
Frozen Heart.description: Reduce the Attack Speed of adjacent enemies by 35%.

Dragon's Claw.name: Dragon's Claw
Dragon's Claw.shortdescription: Wearer gains 75% resistance to magic damage.
Dragon's Claw.description: Wearer gains 75% resistance to magic damage.

Hush.name: Hush
Hush.shortdescription: Basic attacks have 33% chance to prevent mana generation.
Hush.description: Basic Attacks have a 33% chance to silence the target on-hit, prevent the enemy from gaining mana for 4 seconds.

Runaan's Hurricane.name: Runaan's Hurricane
Runaan's Hurricane.shortdescription: Basic attacks target another enemy dealing 75% of Attack Damage.
Runaan's Hurricane.description: Basic Attacks fire an additional missile at another nearby enemy, dealing 75% of the wearer's Attack Damage and applying on-hit effects.

Seraph's Embrace.name: Seraph's Embrace
Seraph's Embrace.description: After casting their spell, the wearer restores 20 Mana.

Force of Nature.name: Force of Nature
Force of Nature.description: Wearer's team gains +1 maximum team size.
